channel.title: Teleportation out of area?

item.title: Teleportation out of area?

if (absX >= 3221 && absX <= 3227 && absY >= 3214 && absY <= 3220) {

}

}[/code]

public void inTown() { if (isInTownCoords() && combatLevel >= 100) { sendMessage("You are above required combat to enter this town"); changeCoords(4324, 4324, 0); } else if (combatLevel <= 99) { sendMessage("You are welcome here"); } }

process() {

inTown();

item.title: Teleportation out of area?
item.dc:creator: @OoSilent OoSilent
item.description:
@OoSilent wrote:

Right, so here’s what I wanted to do… I want it so that lets say, you’re in lumby but you’re over combat 100, if you try entering it teleports you away. I mean, I attempted at it, and here’s what I got.

player.java

public boolean isInTownCoords() { return (absX >= 3221 && absX <= 3227 && absY >= 3214 && absY <= 3220); }
client.java
public void inTown() { if (isInTownCoords() && combatLevel <= 100) { sendMessage("You are above required combat to enter this town"); changeCoords(4324, 4324, 0); } else if (combatLevel <= 30) { sendMessage("You are welcome here"); } }
And that looks like everything to me, and still when i step into the square of coords there, i don't get teleported away.

Read full topic
